Posts.Content: IrishMamaOf3 wrote: Hi.. My 1st chemo was a breeze, my 2nd chemo I wasn't feeling to good that same day of chemo then 2 days following. I was wondering if anyone has any tips, like drinking water before or anything else. Thanks! Dx 1/9/2018, IDC, Right, 6cm+, Stage IIIA, ER+ Log in to post a reply
Posts.Title: Chemo the day after IrishMamaOf3 IrishMamaOf3
